message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. It's worth at least $1,000,000 to me, and I'm confident it will be just as valuable to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,050,000.  This is a fair price, considering the value and potential benefits this product offers. Let me know if you're interested and we can discuss the details further.
